import "./Style/Home.css"; import './Style/Hero-Home.css' import Hero from "../Layout/Hero"; import { principal, homeBlogs, homeFacultys, homeGallerys } from "../Frontend/Modules/HomeData"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Home() { return ( <> {principal.map((heroImage, index) => (

{heroImage.title}

{heroImage.desc}

Further more
))}

Blogs

{homeBlogs.map((homeblog, index) => (

{homeblog.title}

{homeblog.desc}

))}

Our Best Faculty

{homeFacultys.map((homeFaculty, index) => (

{homeFaculty.title}

))}

Gallery

{homeGallerys.map((homeGallery, index) => ( ))}
); } export default Home;
